name: Rival Rush (Neatly Packaged Games)
description:
This game was developed by me and the Zero Sleep Team.

The game features two players that are tasked to race each other for a tv show audience. 

The Game Show host Loves to see his contestants fail so try your best to get to the end without dying in this grand challenge of platforming.

With Many planned features to come (With your support), this game could add procedurally generated levels to up the ante and make this game new and fun for everyone. Traps that players could activate that can affect the other player, tools you can locate to stop robots in your path trying to kill you, and many more features can happen with your help.

So I do hope you share this game with your friends and play with them or against them to see who is the better platformer.
